K12D0713=D1044_H0570:327b-0: @327b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0713=D1044_H0570:327b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje
K12D0713=D1044_H0570:327b-2: chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
K12D0713=D1044_H0570:327b-5: ma h'a te dze te dza ma ti dh'a ra n'i /
K12D0713=D1044_H0570:327b-6: shru ta dh'a ra ni; dza yanti bi dza yanti ma ti dh'a ra n'i sv'ah'a /
K12D0713=D1044_H0570:327b-7: sman bra ma hi zho gnyis zhib tu btags te
K12D0713=D1044_H0570:327b-8: 'o ma'i nang du bskol la sngags 'di lan nyi
K12D0713=D1044_H0570:327b-9: shu rtsa gcig bzlas te zhag bdun gyi bar du
K12D0713=D1044_H0570:328a-1: gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0713=D1044_H0570:328a-4: thos pa nyin zhag gcig la shloo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro //
